title: Valdisotto
text:
Valdisotto is a "<a href="comune">comune</a>" (municipality) in the <a href="Province%20of%20Sondrio">Province of Sondrio</a> in the <a href="Italy">Italian</a> region <a href="Lombardy">Lombardy</a>, located about northeast of <a href="Milan">Milan</a> and about northeast of <a href="Sondrio">Sondrio</a>.
Valdisotto borders the following municipalities: <a href="Bormio">Bormio</a>, <a href="Grosio">Grosio</a>, <a href="Sondalo">Sondalo</a>, <a href="Valdidentro">Valdidentro</a>, <a href="Valfurva">Valfurva</a>.
